24:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L94",null,{"id":"274b16ea-1123-44d9-83b0-756fcf774307","wordgroups":[{"id":"a406ffdb-1855-4c91-ad22-555247c2886b","body":"أَيْنِهَا","analyses":[{"id":"d728fa8e-f2ca-4ee0-a464-5e8607646fe2","lex":null,"root":"أين","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"ayn","wordgroup_id":"a406ffdb-1855-4c91-ad22-555247c2886b","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"274b16ea-1123-44d9-83b0-756fcf774307","order_number":1},{"id":"fa18d903-4c7f-45e3-8405-3cca13134645","body":"إِبْدَانِهَا","analyses":[{"id":"ebe2f44a-1175-4577-acc8-f88014838fcb","lex":null,"root":"بدن","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"bdn","wordgroup_id":"fa18d903-4c7f-45e3-8405-3cca13134645","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"274b16ea-1123-44d9-83b0-756fcf774307","order_number":3}],"analysesMap":{"fa18d903-4c7f-45e3-8405-3cca13134645":[{"id":118587,"root":"بدن","root_slug":"bdn","surah":10,"verse":92,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"فَالْيَوْمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنْ خَلْفَكَ آيَةً وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ النَّاسِ عَنْ آيَاتِنَا لَغَافِلُونَ","translation_text":"Today We shall save only your corpse as a sign to all posterity. A great many people fail to heed Our signs.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ebe2f44a-1175-4577-acc8-f88014838fcb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بدن","wordgroup_id":"fa18d903-4c7f-45e3-8405-3cca13134645"},{"id":128490,"root":"بدن","root_slug":"bdn","surah":22,"verse":36,"word_index":1,"arabic_text":"وَالْبُدْنَ جَعَلْنَاهَا لَكُم مِّن شَعَائِرِ اللَّهِ لَكُمْ فِيهَا خَيْرٌ فَاذْكُرُوا اسْمَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا صَوَافَّ فَإِذَا وَجَبَتْ جُنُوبُهَا فَكُلُوا مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا الْقَانِعَ وَالْمُعْتَرَّ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرْنَاهَا لَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"We have made camels part of God&rsquo;s sacred rites for you. There is much good in them for you, so invoke God&rsquo;s name over them as they are lined up for sacrifice, then, when they have fallen down dead, feed yourselves and those who do not ask, as well as those who do. We have subjected them to you in this way so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ebe2f44a-1175-4577-acc8-f88014838fcb","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بدن","wordgroup_id":"fa18d903-4c7f-45e3-8405-3cca13134645"}]}}]}]
95:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ96:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. يَتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"You &#91;believers&#93; are permitted to lie with your wives during the night of the fast: they are &#91;close&#93; as garments to you, as you are to them. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. In this way God makes His messages clear to people, that they may guard themselves against doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"cc0498ea-0bb4-4c49-a674-cad72f84a214","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"وقي","wordgroup_id":"9d72d86e-89b2-43e0-b14a-fb828550aebc"},{"id":102759,"root":"وقي","root_slug":"wqy","surah":2,"verse":189,"word_index":19,"arabic_text":"يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْأَهِلَّةِ قُلْ هِيَ مَوَاقِيتُ لِلنَّاسِ وَالْحَجِّ وَلَيْسَ الْبِرُّ بِأَن تَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِن ظُهُورِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقَىٰ وَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ أَبْوَابِهَا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ","translation_text":"They ask you &#91;Prophet&#93; about crescent moons. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. But if the culprit is pardoned by his aggrieved brother, this shall be adhered to fairly, and the culprit shall pay what is due in a good way. This is an alleviation from your Lord and an act of mercy. If anyone then exceeds these limits, grievous suffering awaits him","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"f6754c78-1108-4d8d-870a-bf7d8cdb0854","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حرر","wordgroup_id":"b45c367e-db55-4f63-8487-ba5c0e76d1ab"},{"id":102576,"root":"حرر","root_slug":"Hrr","surah":2,"verse":178,"word_index":10,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِصَاصُ فِي الْقَتْلَى الْحُرُّ بِالْحُرِّ وَالْعَبْدُ بِالْعَبْدِ وَالْأُنثَىٰ بِالْأُنثَىٰ فَمَنْ عُفِيَ لَهُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ شَيْءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَدَاءٌ إِلَيْهِ بِإِحْسَانٍ ذَٰلِكَ تَخْفِيفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"You who believe, fair retribution is prescribed for you in cases of murder: the free man for the free man, the slave for the slave, the female for the female. But if the culprit is pardoned by his aggrieved brother, this shall be adhered to fairly, and the culprit shall pay what is due in a good way. This is an alleviation from your Lord and an act of mercy. If anyone then exceeds these limits, grievous suffering awaits him","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"f6754c78-1108-4d8d-870a-bf7d8cdb0854","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حرر","wordgroup_id":"b45c367e-db55-4f63-8487-ba5c0e76d1ab"}]}}]}]

God is always ready to pardon and forgive","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"f3edd6c7-e018-482b-8207-02b2b8c16b3d","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غوط","wordgroup_id":"385ffba1-9907-45b7-8e1e-40699f6e2f12"},{"id":109389,"root":"غوط","root_slug":"GwT","surah":5,"verse":6,"word_index":33,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَامْسَحُوا بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ مَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when you are about to pray, wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows, wipe your heads, wash your feet up to the ankles and, if required, wash your whole body. If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. God does not wish to place any burden on you: He only wishes to cleanse you and perfect His blessing on you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"f3edd6c7-e018-482b-8207-02b2b8c16b3d","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"غوط","wordgroup_id":"385ffba1-9907-45b7-8e1e-40699f6e2f12"}]}}]}]

You are also forbidden to allot shares &#91;of meat&#93; by drawing marked arrows -a heinous practice- today the disbelievers have lost all hope that you will give up your religion. Do not fear them: fear Me. Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed My blessing upon you, and chosen as your religion islam: &#91;total devotion to God&#93;; but if any of you is forced by hunger to eat forbidden food, with no intention of doing wrong, then God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"cc388487-6bf7-44a4-9e1f-61b2916250b7","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"نعم","wordgroup_id":"677288ef-9adf-45d1-92ac-ba6b130a9214"},{"id":109407,"root":"نعم","root_slug":"nEm","surah":5,"verse":6,"word_index":58,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَامْسَحُوا بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ مَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when you are about to pray, wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows, wipe your heads, wash your feet up to the ankles and, if required, wash your whole body. Truly, God&rsquo;s hands are open wide: He gives as He pleases. What has been sent down to you from your Lord is sure to increase insolence and defiance in many of them. We have sown enmity and hatred amongst them till the Day of Resurrection. Whenever they kindle the fire of war, God will put it out. in the changing of the winds and clouds that run their appointed courses between the sky and earth: there are signs in all these for those who use their minds","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ebce67b5-8389-4d99-9d04-7098cedd4cbf","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ليل","wordgroup_id":"066c8dfd-871c-41a7-9585-7dd970108b84"},{"id":102695,"root":"ليل","root_slug":"lyl","surah":2,"verse":187,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَّهُنَّ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنكُمْ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"You &#91;believers&#93; are permitted to lie with your wives during the night of the fast: they are &#91;close&#93; as garments to you, as you are to them. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. In this way God makes His messages clear to people, that they may guard themselves against doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ebce67b5-8389-4d99-9d04-7098cedd4cbf","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ليل","wordgroup_id":"066c8dfd-871c-41a7-9585-7dd970108b84"},{"id":102723,"root":"ليل","root_slug":"lyl","surah":2,"verse":187,"word_index":47,"arabic_text":"أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَّهُنَّ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنكُمْ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"You &#91;believers&#93; are permitted to lie with your wives during the night of the fast: they are &#91;close&#93; as garments to you, as you are to them. in the alternation of night and day; in the ships that sail the seas with goods for people; in the water which God sends down from the sky to give life to the earth when it has been barren, scattering all kinds of creatures over it; He said, &lsquo;How will God give this life when it has died?&rsquo; So God made him die for a hundred years, and then raised him up, saying, &lsquo;How long did you stay like that?&rsquo; He answered, &lsquo;A day, or part of a day.&rsquo; God said, &lsquo;No, you stayed like that for a hundred years. Look at your food and drink: they have not gone bad. 2c:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L94",null,{"id":"34deedd8-90f5-40b6-9542-84fa63cf7351","wordgroups":[{"id":"708fe499-75f8-482b-9daa-15c1796691ee","body":"بَلَغُوا","analyses":[{"id":"e2d4187f-290c-47be-9404-3094cb4d0a8e","lex":null,"root":"بلغ","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"blG","wordgroup_id":"708fe499-75f8-482b-9daa-15c1796691ee","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"34deedd8-90f5-40b6-9542-84fa63cf7351","order_number":1},{"id":"3dbde799-c5a2-4731-832f-a5dd14e52e9b","body":"مَصْرَهُمْ","analyses":[{"id":"dee56282-f08b-40c2-979e-21dba4ca940c","lex":null,"root":"مصر","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"mSr","wordgroup_id":"3dbde799-c5a2-4731-832f-a5dd14e52e9b","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"34deedd8-90f5-40b6-9542-84fa63cf7351","order_number":2},{"id":"66ac5670-626f-4ea6-b4ef-49ae4f526bb2","body":"عُوجِلُوا","analyses":[{"id":"7e599c94-9626-42f0-af37-fb84cce6e105","lex":null,"root":"عوج","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"Ewj","wordgroup_id":"66ac5670-626f-4ea6-b4ef-49ae4f526bb2","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"34deedd8-90f5-40b6-9542-84fa63cf7351","order_number":3}],"analysesMap":{"3dbde799-c5a2-4731-832f-a5dd14e52e9b":[{"id":101133,"root":"مصر","root_slug":"mSr","surah":2,"verse":61,"word_index":32,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَن نَّصْبِرَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامٍ وَاحِدٍ فَادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُخْرِجْ لَنَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ مِن بَقْلِهَا وَقِثَّائِهَا وَفُومِهَا وَعَدَسِهَا وَبَصَلِهَا قَالَ أَتَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الَّذِي هُوَ أَدْنَىٰ بِالَّذِي هُوَ خَيْرٌ اهْبِطُوا مِصْرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُم مَّا سَأَلْتُمْ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا يَكْفُرُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ النَّبِيِّينَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا وَّكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ","translation_text":"Remember when you said, &lsquo;Moses, we cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. All this was because they disobeyed and were lawbreakers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dee56282-f08b-40c2-979e-21dba4ca940c","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"مصر","wordgroup_id":"3dbde799-c5a2-4731-832f-a5dd14e52e9b"}],"708fe499-75f8-482b-9daa-15c1796691ee":[{"id":102839,"root":"بلغ","root_slug":"blG","surah":2,"verse":196,"word_index":15,"arabic_text":"وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ فَمَن كَانَ مِنكُم مَّرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِّن رَّأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِّن صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ فَإِذَا أَمِنتُمْ فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن لَّمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"Complete the pilgrimages, major and minor, for the sake of God. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. Always be mindful of God, and be aware that He is stern in His retribution","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"e2d4187f-290c-47be-9404-3094cb4d0a8e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بلغ","wordgroup_id":"708fe499-75f8-482b-9daa-15c1796691ee"},{"id":103397,"root":"بلغ","root_slug":"blG","surah":2,"verse":231,"word_index":4,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِّتَعْتَدُوا وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"When you divorce women and they have reached their set time, then either keep or release them in a fair manner. If someone does so intentionally the penalty is an offering of a domestic animal brought to the Kaba, equivalent- as judged by two just men among you- to the one he has killed; alternatively, he may atone by feeding the needy or by fasting an equivalent number of days, so that he may taste the full gravity of his deed. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103054,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":212,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ","translation_text":"The life of this world is made to seem glamorous to the disbelievers, and they laugh at those who believe. But those who are mindful of God will be above them on the Day of Resurrection: God provides immeasurably for whoever He pleases","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103093,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":213,"word_index":49,"arabic_text":"كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ","translation_text":"Mankind was a single community, then God sent prophets to bring good news and warning, and with them He sent the Scripture with the Truth, to judge between people in their disagreements. It was only those to whom it was given who disagreed about it after clear signs had come to them, because of rivalry between them. So by His leave God guided the believers to the truth they had differed about: God guides whoever He will to a straight path","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103365,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":26,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103361,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":20,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103393,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":29,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God. These are God&rsquo;s bounds, which He makes clear for those who know","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0bfbfa27-8503-4bd9-bfff-6778607c7096","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"1295fc9b-861d-4e0f-8b99-c2dbb005ad98"},{"id":103387,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":22,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. All this was because they disobeyed and were lawbreakers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"d0b514d1-58eb-472c-9832-f8370a7c3e87","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"43564706-8408-48a0-9dff-8db49814e393"},{"id":101539,"root":"عصي","root_slug":"ESy","surah":2,"verse":93,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ الطُّورَ خُذُوا مَا آتَيْنَاكُم بِقُوَّةٍ وَاسْمَعُوا قَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَأُشْرِبُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْعِجْلَ بِكُفْرِهِمْ قُلْ بِئْسَمَا يَأْمُرُكُم بِهِ إِيمَانُكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ","translation_text":"Remember when We took your pledge, making the mountain tower above you, and said, &lsquo;Hold on firmly to what We have given you, and listen to &#91;what We say&#93;.&rsquo; They said, &lsquo;We hear and we disobey,&rsquo; and through their disbelief they were made to drink &#91;the love of&#93; the calf deep into their hearts","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"d0b514d1-58eb-472c-9832-f8370a7c3e87","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"43564706-8408-48a0-9dff-8db49814e393"}]}}]}]

another in sin and aggression against them. This is the atonement for breaking your oaths- keep your oaths. God will not speak to them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them: an agonizing torment awaits them","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"93bdc887-ce89-48b5-a95c-1d9776660415","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6ace14e8-c270-4a17-a6f6-9b6c04fb87d1"},{"id":102556,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":177,"word_index":32,"arabic_text":"لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"Goodness does not consist in turning your face towards East or West. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"93bdc887-ce89-48b5-a95c-1d9776660415","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6ace14e8-c270-4a17-a6f6-9b6c04fb87d1"},{"id":103054,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":212,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ","translation_text":"The life of this world is made to seem glamorous to the disbelievers, and they laugh at those who believe. But those who are mindful of God will be above them on the Day of Resurrection: God provides immeasurably for whoever He pleases","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"93bdc887-ce89-48b5-a95c-1d9776660415","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6ace14e8-c270-4a17-a6f6-9b6c04fb87d1"},{"id":103093,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":213,"word_index":49,"arabic_text":"كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ","translation_text":"Mankind was a single community, then God sent prophets to bring good news and warning, and with them He sent the Scripture with the Truth, to judge between people in their disagreements. It was only those to whom it was given who disagreed about it after clear signs had come to them, because of rivalry between them. So by His leave God guided the believers to the truth they had differed about: God guides whoever He will to a straight path","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"93bdc887-ce89-48b5-a95c-1d9776660415","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6ace14e8-c270-4a17-a6f6-9b6c04fb87d1"},{"id":103361,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":20,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"93bdc887-ce89-48b5-a95c-1d9776660415","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6ace14e8-c270-4a17-a6f6-9b6c04fb87d1"},{"id":103365,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":26,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. If only You would give us just a little more time.&rsquo; Say to them, &lsquo;Little is the enjoyment in this world, the Hereafter is far better for those who are mindful of God: you will not be wronged by as much as the fibre in a date stone","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1165616a-486b-484e-b34c-7323fa43a99d","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"يدي","wordgroup_id":"6d875e8a-e835-4d1a-a6ab-2cdff3b96e19"},{"id":108081,"root":"يدي","root_slug":"ydy","surah":4,"verse":91,"word_index":22,"arabic_text":"سَتَجِدُونَ آخَرِينَ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَأْمَنُوكُمْ وَيَأْمَنُوا قَوْمَهُمْ كُلَّ مَا رُدُّوا إِلَى الْفِتْنَةِ أُرْكِسُوا فِيهَا فَإِن لَّمْ يَعْتَزِلُوكُمْ وَيُلْقُوا إِلَيْكُمُ السَّلَمَ وَيَكُفُّوا أَيْدِيَهُمْ فَخُذُوهُمْ وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ وَأُولَـٰئِكُمْ جَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَانًا مُّبِينًا","translation_text":"You will find others who wish to be safe from you, and from their own people, but whenever they are back in a situation where they are tempted &#91;to fight you&#93;, they succumb to it. So if they neither withdraw, nor offer you peace, nor restrain themselves from fighting you, seize and kill them wherever you encounter them: We give you clear authority against such people","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1165616a-486b-484e-b34c-7323fa43a99d","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"يدي","wordgroup_id":"6d875e8a-e835-4d1a-a6ab-2cdff3b96e19"},{"id":109399,"root":"يدي","root_slug":"ydy","surah":5,"verse":6,"word_index":45,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَامْسَحُوا بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ مَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when you are about to pray, wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows, wipe your heads, wash your feet up to the ankles and, if required, wash your whole body. If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. God does not wish to place any burden on you: He only wishes to cleanse you and perfect His blessing on you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b029b99b-6859-4d68-ba26-f7c3ccff5845","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"b9740b03-4aa5-4838-adae-d50d4ce0790a"},{"id":112115,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":6,"verse":99,"word_index":6,"arabic_text":"وَهُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًا نُّخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّا مُّتَرَاكِبًا وَمِنَ النَّخْلِ مِن طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌ دَانِيَةٌ وَجَنَّاتٍ مِّنْ أَعْنَابٍ وَالزَّيْتُونَ وَالرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَابِهٍ انظُرُوا إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِ إِذَا أَثْمَرَ وَيَنْعِهِ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكُمْ لَآيَاتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ","translation_text":"It is He who sends down water from the sky. With it We produce the shoots of each plant, then bring greenery from it, and from that We bring out grains, one riding on the other in close-packed rows. From the date palm come clusters of low-hanging dates, and there are gardens of vines, olives, and pomegranates, alike yet different. Watch their fruits as they grow and ripen! In all this there are signs for those who would believe","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b029b99b-6859-4d68-ba26-f7c3ccff5845","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"b9740b03-4aa5-4838-adae-d50d4ce0790a"},{"id":113502,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":7,"verse":50,"word_index":10,"arabic_text":"وَنَادَىٰ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ أَفِيضُوا عَلَيْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالُوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ","translation_text":"The people of the Fire will call to the people of Paradise, &lsquo;Give us some water, or any of the sustenance God has granted you!&rsquo; and they will reply, &lsquo;God has forbidden both to the disbelievers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b029b99b-6859-4d68-ba26-f7c3ccff5845","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"b9740b03-4aa5-4838-adae-d50d4ce0790a"},{"id":113611,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":7,"verse":57,"word_index":19,"arabic_text":"وَهُوَ الَّذِي يُرْسِلُ الرِّيَاحَ بُشْرًا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ رَحْمَتِهِ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا أَقَلَّتْ سَحَابًا ثِقَالًا سُقْنَاهُ لِبَلَدٍ مَّيِّتٍ فَأَنزَلْنَا بِهِ الْمَاءَ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ كَذَٰلِكَ نُخْرِجُ الْمَوْتَىٰ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ","translation_text":"It is God who sends the winds, bearing good news of His coming grace, and when they have gathered up the heavy clouds, We drive them to a dead land where We cause rain to fall, bringing out all kinds of crops, just as We shall bring out the dead. 97:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ98:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything38:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L94",null,{"id":"fd2aacb6-cfc3-4a0f-9de4-765b7359bd0d","wordgroups":[{"id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40","body":"الْمُضَرِيَّاتِ","analyses":[{"id":"61e6718b-9c8d-41e3-beb5-fec5e3affc65","lex":null,"root":"ضرر","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"Drr","wordgroup_id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fd2aacb6-cfc3-4a0f-9de4-765b7359bd0d","order_number":1},{"id":"2d8d345a-8e4b-4b35-84d3-c6a3f7d2de24","body":"كَزَّةً","analyses":[{"id":"0db18cf5-c2af-4672-9275-e5085a3f2e26","lex":null,"root":"كزز","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"kzz","wordgroup_id":"2d8d345a-8e4b-4b35-84d3-c6a3f7d2de24","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"fd2aacb6-cfc3-4a0f-9de4-765b7359bd0d","order_number":3}],"analysesMap":{"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40":[{"id":101660,"root":"ضرر","root_slug":"Drr","surah":2,"verse":102,"word_index":54,"arabic_text":"وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ وَمَا هُم بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"and followed what the evil ones had fabricated about the Kingdom of Solomon instead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. But if anyone is forced to eat such things by hunger, rather than desire or excess, he commits no sin: God is most merciful and forgiving","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"61e6718b-9c8d-41e3-beb5-fec5e3affc65","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ضرر","wordgroup_id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40"},{"id":102565,"root":"ضرر","root_slug":"Drr","surah":2,"verse":177,"word_index":43,"arabic_text":"لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"Goodness does not consist in turning your face towards East or West. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"61e6718b-9c8d-41e3-beb5-fec5e3affc65","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ضرر","wordgroup_id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40"},{"id":103103,"root":"ضرر","root_slug":"Drr","surah":2,"verse":214,"word_index":15,"arabic_text":"أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُم مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِن قَبْلِكُم مَّسَّتْهُمُ الْبَأْسَاءُ وَالضَّرَّاءُ وَزُلْزِلُوا حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَ الرَّسُولُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ مَتَىٰ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ أَلَا إِنَّ نَصْرَ اللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ","translation_text":"Do you suppose that you will enter the Garden without first having suffered like those before you? They were afflicted by misfortune and hardship, and they were so shaken that even &#91;their&#93; messenger and the believers with him cried, &lsquo;When will God&rsquo;s help arrive?&rsquo; Truly, God&rsquo;s help is near","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"61e6718b-9c8d-41e3-beb5-fec5e3affc65","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ضرر","wordgroup_id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40"},{"id":103404,"root":"ضرر","root_slug":"Drr","surah":2,"verse":231,"word_index":13,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِّتَعْتَدُوا وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"When you divorce women and they have reached their set time, then either keep or release them in a fair manner. Do not hold on to them with intent to harm them and commit aggression: anyone who does this wrongs himself. Do not make a mockery of God&rsquo;s revelations; remember the favour He blessed you with, and the Scripture and wisdom He sent to teach you. Be mindful of God and know that He has full knowledge of everything","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"61e6718b-9c8d-41e3-beb5-fec5e3affc65","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ضرر","wordgroup_id":"fad6385f-ba14-4dc2-9bce-2217c818cd40"},{"id":103463,"root":"ضرر","root_slug":"Drr","surah":2,"verse":233,"word_index":23,"arabic_text":"وَالْوَالِدَاتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ الرَّضَاعَةَ وَعَلَى الْمَوْلُودِ لَهُ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَا تُضَارَّ وَالِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَّهُ بِوَلَدِهِ وَعَلَى الْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّا آتَيْتُم بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ","translation_text":"Mothers suckle their children for two whole years, if they wish to complete the term, and clothing and maintenance must be borne by the father in a fair manner. No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. in the changing of the winds and clouds that run their appointed courses between the sky and earth: there are signs in all these for those who use their minds","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"41c1662d-0163-4a33-bf83-e173296c4c1e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"56dbb863-086b-4d93-ace5-e8bfd1893990"},{"id":107451,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":4,"verse":43,"word_index":37,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْرَبُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنتُمْ سُكَارَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَعْلَمُوا مَا تَقُولُونَ وَلَا جُنُبًا إِلَّا عَابِرِي سَبِيلٍ حَتَّىٰ تَغْتَسِلُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًا","translation_text":"You who believe, do not come anywhere near the prayer if you are intoxicated, not until you know what you are saying; nor if you are in a state of major ritual impurity- though you may pass through the mosque- not until you have bathed; if you are ill, on a journey, have relieved yourselves, or had intercourse, and cannot find any water, then find some clean sand and wipe your faces and hands with it. If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. God does not wish to place any burden on you: He only wishes to cleanse you and perfect His blessing on you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"41c1662d-0163-4a33-bf83-e173296c4c1e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"56dbb863-086b-4d93-ace5-e8bfd1893990"},{"id":112115,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":6,"verse":99,"word_index":6,"arabic_text":"وَهُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًا نُّخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّا مُّتَرَاكِبًا وَمِنَ النَّخْلِ مِن طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌ دَانِيَةٌ وَجَنَّاتٍ مِّنْ أَعْنَابٍ وَالزَّيْتُونَ وَالرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَابِهٍ انظُرُوا إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِ إِذَا أَثْمَرَ وَيَنْعِهِ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكُمْ لَآيَاتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ","translation_text":"It is He who sends down water from the sky. From the date palm come clusters of low-hanging dates, and there are gardens of vines, olives, and pomegranates, alike yet different. Watch their fruits as they grow and ripen! Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"Concerning your children, God commands you that a son should have the equivalent share of two daughters. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel wherever any of you may be, turn your faces towards it, so that people may have no argument against you- except for the wrongdoers among them: do not fear them; fear Me- and so that I may perfect My favour on you and you may be guided","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"77877ad7-3b14-4c99-ac12-c401d8745f0e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"تمم","wordgroup_id":"182bd3b9-94cb-4573-904c-4f234288c968"},{"id":102721,"root":"تمم","root_slug":"tmm","surah":2,"verse":187,"word_index":44,"arabic_text":"أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَّهُنَّ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنكُمْ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"You &#91;believers&#93; are permitted to lie with your wives during the night of the fast: they are &#91;close&#93; as garments to you, as you are to them. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. In this way God makes His messages clear to people, that they may guard themselves against doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"77877ad7-3b14-4c99-ac12-c401d8745f0e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"تمم","wordgroup_id":"182bd3b9-94cb-4573-904c-4f234288c968"},{"id":102830,"root":"تمم","root_slug":"tmm","surah":2,"verse":196,"word_index":1,"arabic_text":"وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ فَمَن كَانَ مِنكُم مَّرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِّن رَّأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِّن صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ فَإِذَا أَمِنتُمْ فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن لَّمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"Complete the pilgrimages, major and minor, for the sake of God. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. You are also forbidden to allot shares &#91;of meat&#93; by drawing marked arrows -a heinous practice- today the disbelievers have lost all hope that you will give up your religion. Do not fear them: fear Me. Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed My blessing upon you, and chosen as your religion islam: &#91;total devotion to God&#93;; but if any of you is forced by hunger to eat forbidden food, with no intention of doing wrong, then God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"77877ad7-3b14-4c99-ac12-c401d8745f0e","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"تمم","wordgroup_id":"182bd3b9-94cb-4573-904c-4f234288c968"},{"id":109406,"root":"تمم","root_slug":"tmm","surah":5,"verse":6,"word_index":57,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى الْمَرَافِقِ وَامْسَحُوا بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى الْكَعْبَيْنِ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًا فَاطَّهَّرُوا وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَاءَ أَحَدٌ مِّنكُم مِّنَ الْغَائِطِ أَوْ لَامَسْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا فَامْسَحُوا بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ مَا يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when you are about to pray, wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows, wipe your heads, wash your feet up to the ankles and, if required, wash your whole body. I will tell you what your Lord has really forbidden you. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9c237fa0-e927-438d-8203-f5cf445e4564","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"أبو","wordgroup_id":"e9880baf-3ffa-4af8-b4eb-2734a2b508dd"},{"id":106923,"root":"أبو","root_slug":"abw","surah":4,"verse":11,"word_index":56,"arabic_text":"يُوصِيكُمُ اللَّهُ فِي أَوْلَادِكُمْ لِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ فَإِن كُنَّ نِسَاءً فَوْقَ اثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُنَّ ثُلُثَا مَا تَرَكَ وَإِن كَانَتْ وَاحِدَةً فَلَهَا النِّصْفُ وَلِأَبَوَيْهِ لِكُلِّ وَاحِدٍ مِّنْهُمَا السُّدُسُ مِمَّا تَرَكَ إِن كَانَ لَهُ وَلَدٌ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهُ وَلَدٌ وَوَرِثَهُ أَبَوَاهُ فَلِأُمِّهِ الثُّلُثُ فَإِن كَانَ لَهُ إِخْوَةٌ فَلِأُمِّهِ السُّدُسُ مِن بَعْدِ وَصِيَّةٍ يُوصِي بِهَا أَوْ دَيْنٍ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَاؤُكُمْ لَا تَدْرُونَ أَيُّهُمْ أَقْرَبُ لَكُمْ نَفْعًا فَرِيضَةً مِّنَ اللَّهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"Concerning your children, God commands you that a son should have the equivalent share of two daughters. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. God is always ready to pardon and forgive","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"aaf3ea9d-593c-4396-aff5-3dedd0caee80","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قرب","wordgroup_id":"e5d2753a-8f6f-4fdf-9618-eceac23fb9f3"},{"id":107869,"root":"قرب","root_slug":"qrb","surah":4,"verse":77,"word_index":37,"arabic_text":"أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمْ كُفُّوا أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقِتَالُ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُمْ يَخْشَوْنَ النَّاسَ كَخَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ أَوْ أَشَدَّ خَشْيَةً وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبْتَ عَلَيْنَا الْقِتَالَ لَوْلَا أَخَّرْتَنَا إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ قَرِيبٍ قُلْ مَتَاعُ الدُّنْيَا قَلِيلٌ وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا","translation_text":"&#91;Prophet&#93;, do you not see those who were told, &lsquo;Restrain yourselves from fighting, perform the prayer, and pay the prescribed alms&rsquo;? When fighting was ordained for them, some of them feared men as much as, or even more than, they feared God, saying, &lsquo;Lord, why have You ordained fighting for us? If only You would give us just a little more time.&rsquo; Say to them, &lsquo;Little is the enjoyment in this world, the Hereafter is far better for those who are mindful of God: you will not be wronged by as much as the fibre in a date stone","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"aaf3ea9d-593c-4396-aff5-3dedd0caee80","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قرب","wordgroup_id":"e5d2753a-8f6f-4fdf-9618-eceac23fb9f3"},{"id":108697,"root":"قرب","root_slug":"qrb","surah":4,"verse":135,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا قَوَّامِينَ بِالْقِسْطِ شُهَدَاءَ لِلَّهِ وَلَوْ عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَوِ الْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْأَقْرَبِينَ إِن يَكُنْ غَنِيًّا أَوْ فَقِيرًا فَاللَّهُ أَوْلَىٰ بِهِمَا فَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا الْهَوَىٰ أَن تَعْدِلُوا وَإِن تَلْوُوا أَوْ تُعْرِضُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا","translation_text":"You who believe, uphold justice and bear witness to God, even if it is against yourselves, your parents, or your close relatives. أَتَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الَّذِي هُوَ أَدْنَىٰ بِالَّذِي هُوَ خَيْرٌ اهْبِطُوا مِصْرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُم مَّا سَأَلْتُمْ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا يَكْفُرُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ النَّبِيِّينَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا وَّكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ","translation_text":"Remember when you said, &lsquo;Moses, we cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. Evil indeed is the &#91;price&#93; for which they sold their souls, if only they knew","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"15d2aba3-b890-4446-b5b2-19ad19615c30","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بين","wordgroup_id":"3ea3c4b7-10b8-40ac-b421-2fc30e93863c"},{"id":101747,"root":"بين","root_slug":"byn","surah":2,"verse":109,"word_index":19,"arabic_text":"وَدَّ كَثِيرٌ مِّنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ لَوْ يَرُدُّونَكُم مِّن بَعْدِ إِيمَانِكُمْ كُفَّارًا حَسَدًا مِّنْ عِندِ أَنفُسِهِم مِّن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْحَقُّ فَاعْفُوا وَاصْفَحُوا حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَ اللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ","translation_text":"Even after the truth has become clear to them, many of the People of the Book wish they could turn you back to disbelief after you have believed, out of their selfish envy. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. 99:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ9a:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. They have drawn God&rsquo;s wrath upon themselves. &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? words: they say, &lsquo;We hear and disobey,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; &#91;adding the insult&#93; &lsquo;May you not hear,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Raina &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; twisting it abusively with their tongues so as to disparage religion. If they had said, &lsquo;We hear and obey,&rsquo; &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Unzurna &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; that would have been better and more proper for them. But God has spurned them for their defiance; they believe very little","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"caa36e05-b5b6-4ac6-ac05-2421820ebfab","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"350e83a4-27a0-497d-ade0-d37dca345370"},{"id":110464,"root":"عصي","root_slug":"ESy","surah":5,"verse":78,"word_index":15,"arabic_text":"لُعِنَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُودَ وَعِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا وَّكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ","translation_text":"Those Children of Israel who defied &#91;God&#93; were rejected through the words of David, and Jesus, son of Mary, because they disobeyed, they persistently overstepped the limits","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"caa36e05-b5b6-4ac6-ac05-2421820ebfab","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"350e83a4-27a0-497d-ade0-d37dca345370"},{"id":111188,"root":"عصي","root_slug":"ESy","surah":6,"verse":15,"word_index":5,"arabic_text":"قُلْ إِنِّي أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ","translation_text":"Say, &lsquo;I fear the punishment of a dreadful Day if I disobey my Lord","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"caa36e05-b5b6-4ac6-ac05-2421820ebfab","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عصي","wordgroup_id":"350e83a4-27a0-497d-ade0-d37dca345370"}]}}]}]

This is the atonement for breaking your oaths- keep your oaths. In this way God makes clear His revelations to you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"e9cc0d55-d6fe-46b1-a8d1-b47fd217a26a","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"سكن","wordgroup_id":"734186ab-eb56-4a1c-92f2-90751667ac89"},{"id":110682,"root":"سكن","root_slug":"skn","surah":5,"verse":95,"word_index":30,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقْتُلُوا الصَّيْدَ وَأَنتُمْ حُرُمٌ وَمَن قَتَلَهُ مِنكُم مُّتَعَمِّدًا فَجَزَاءٌ مِّثْلُ مَا قَتَلَ مِنَ النَّعَمِ يَحْكُمُ بِهِ ذَوَا عَدْلٍ مِّنكُمْ هَدْيًا بَالِغَ الْكَعْبَةِ أَوْ كَفَّارَةٌ طَعَامُ مَسَاكِينَ أَوْ عَدْلُ ذَٰلِكَ صِيَامًا لِّيَذُوقَ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِ عَفَا اللَّهُ عَمَّا سَلَفَ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَيَنتَقِمُ اللَّهُ مِنْهُ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ ذُو انتِقَامٍ","translation_text":"You who believe, do not kill game while you are in the state of consecration &#91;for pilgrimage&#93;. If someone does so intentionally the penalty is an offering of a domestic animal brought to the Kaba, equivalent- as judged by two just men among you- to the one he has killed; alternatively, he may atone by feeding the needy or by fasting an equivalent number of days, so that he may taste the full gravity of his deed. Do not hold on to them with intent to harm them and commit aggression: anyone who does this wrongs himself. Do not make a mockery of God&rsquo;s revelations; remember the favour He blessed you with, and the Scripture and wisdom He sent to teach you. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. In this way God makes His messages clear to people, that they may guard themselves against doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103362,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":21,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103374,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":42,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103370,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":36,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103366,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":27,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103390,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":26,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God. These are God&rsquo;s bounds, which He makes clear for those who know","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"9a75209c-89ad-4d98-b3f3-3f78d5ccf899","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حدد","wordgroup_id":"8f78b89a-cae2-4d84-954a-42a875a2b481"},{"id":103388,"root":"حدد","root_slug":"Hdd","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":23,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God.
